greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Values of the 2-complement of n in ternary representation.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: a(n) = if n<3 then 2 - n else 3*a(floor(n/3)) + 2 - n mod 3.
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 20 2010
